Text:
doesnt work for me tried all compatability modes, updating directx , and removing and reinstalling physics. I manage to get the game to boot then after the final splash screen and outlining of a man appears and then i get a CTD with windows had to close yada yada. I look in event viewer to find
 Faulting application name: SawGame.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x4ad39977

Exception code: 0xc0000005
Fault offset: 0x010571f2
Faulting process id: 0x11b0
Faulting application start time: 0x01ca557b064e2b48
Faulting application path: C:\Program Files (x86)\SAW\Binaries\SawGame.exe
Faulting module path: C:\Program Files (x86)\SAW\Binaries\SawGame.exe

Also i am using win7 RTM X64 Ultimate
try this one. just the german crack with 3 steam-files of CS:Source. for me it worked  http://torrents.thepiratebay.org/5241439/SAW_-_The_Game_Crack_2nd_Try.5241439.TPB.torrent
